name: Fireside Game
description:
On July 24, 1933 in the midst of the Great Depression, President Roosevelt gave his first Fireside Chat, a weekly radio program that encouraged Americans to take action. Fireside Game places you in the role of Flamey, an ember just looking to burn this uncontrollable world, but something is pulling them to be more. Explore the world as a tiny spark, until you find your rhythm and grow to a mighty flame.

Play starts by clicking the mouse to the beat. As play progresses, players can target other items with their flames. Eventually they run wild through the forest (Using WASD), burning everything they touch. 

Each stage that you play adds to the backing track, each playthrough, the soundtrack is slightly different based on your play.
